body.p:
Louisville Courier Office,
May 7th 1861.
Gov. B. Magoffin,

My Dear Sir; -- this will be handed you by W. G. Timberlake, Esq., of this city, whom I beg to introduce to your acquaintance. He is a worthy and reliable gentleman, as the papers in his possession ^will show;^ and if the Legislature should Enact what he wishes I commend him to your favorable consideration for the Position he desires.

Very Resp'y Y'rs
W. N. Haldeman.
